GrandeOuverture_GPIO.title: GPIO Physical PIN for big opening
GrandeOuverture_GPIO.description: The GPIO pin the plugin should use to open totally the portail.

GrandeOuverture_onCommandValueIsHigh.title: Grande Ouverture command polarity
GrandeOuverture_onCommandValueIsHigh.description: Set to True if the command should be LOW-HIGH-LOW to activate.

PetiteOuverture_GPIO.title: GPIO Physical PIN for little opening
PetiteOuverture_GPIO.description: The GPIO Physical PIN the plugin should use to open only the small door of the portail.

PetiteOuverture_onCommandValueIsHigh.title: Petite Ouverture command polarity
PetiteOuverture_onCommandValueIsHigh.description: Set to True if the command should be LOW-HIGH-LOW to activate.

Contact_GPIO.title: GPIO Physical PIN for state input
Contact_GPIO.description: The GPIO pin the plugin should use to read the state of the Portail.

Contact_closedValueIsHigh.title: Closed detector polarity
Contact_closedValueIsHigh.description: The polarity for the detector of opening state. If True, the CLOSED state is for a HIGH value.

emitDurationMS.title: Emit time
emitDurationMS.description: How many milliseconds should the GPIO outputs be set?
